means: [人名] [苏格兰人、爱尔兰人、英格兰人姓氏] 默里 Murray的变体

sentence.Network_en: She wore a murrey - coloured gown with a little lace collar.
sentence.Network_cn: 她穿了一件带花边小领子的黑紫色长袍.

sentence.Network_en: Even so, Murrey holds illusions that Europe, any other market for that matter, could replace Asia.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管如此, Murrey对欧洲仍然不报任何幻想,对于这种产品, 任何其他市场都无法取代亚洲.

sentence.Network_en: Murrey says he is pursuing deals in Germany and Russia as well as in Western Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: murrey说他正在跟踪德国和俄国及其他西欧国家的业务.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin moratus, from morum 'mulberry'

auth_sentence.content: The Murrey is beyond repair, we shall not be producing the rice, wheat and other crops that have fed the world for so long.
